title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Beginner-Level Chinese Character Education Module Utilizing Multimodal Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can handwrite 150 basic Chinese characters with 80% accuracy following the correct stroke order
Learners can explain the semantic components (liushu) of 100 Chinese characters with over 70% accuracy through visual form analysis
Learners can reproduce pronunciation-character associations for 80 daily vocabulary items with 85% accuracy using role-playing and digital flashcards

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
